name: VCO - wavetable
description: Simple VCO using wavetables for wave shapes. Wavetables are loaded from the MicroSD card.

parameters.name: Wavetable
parameters.description: Chooses the wavetable file from the MicroSD card.

parameters.name: Wave offset
parameters.description: Sets the position within the selected wavetable.

parameters.name: Octave
parameters.description: Adjusts the VCO tuning in octaves.

parameters.name: Transpose
parameters.description: Adjusts the VCO tuning in semitones.

parameters.name: Fine tune
parameters.description: Adjusts the VCO tuning in cents.

parameters.name: Amplitude
parameters.description: Sets the amplitude of the output (pre-gain).

parameters.name: Gain
parameters.description: Sets the level of the output.

parameters.name: Wave input
parameters.description: Input bus to modulate the wave offset.

parameters.name: Wavetable 0 Chooses the wavetable. Wave offset
parameters.description: Sets the position within the wavetable.

parameters.name: 0 28 0 Sets an input bus to modulate the wave offset. Output
Wavetable 0 Chooses the wavetable. Wave offset
parameters.description: Sets the position within the wavetable.
